comments.body:
Include a handler that removes the link at the end of the test. Take a look at setup_remote_tmp_dir for an example:

https://github.com/ansible/ansible/tree/devel/test/integration/targets/setup_remote_tmp_dir/

The temp dir itself will be cleaned up by the handler from setup_remote_tmp_dir.
Sorry for the delay! Thank you for the feedback, I implemented this in my latest commit.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@      notify: remove temporary flatpak link

  become: true
